price: Huwag kang magpagalaw ng dila mo, [O Propeta Muḥammad,] kasabay nito upang magmadali ka nito.
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
